title: Christmas Games Music Pack
description: 12 original Christmas tracks, 30 mins of vibrant orchestral music, with loops and stingers. Festive cheer awaits!
longDescription:
Introducing the Christmas Games Music Pack: Dive into the festive spirit with 12 original holiday tracks tailored for video game environments.


| YOUTUBE PREVIEW


| SOUNDCLOUD PREVIEW


Each composition exudes vintage charm, drawing inspiration from 1950s comedy movie soundtracks and jazz ensembles. With catchy melodies and versatile arrangements, these tracks seamlessly enhance gameplay across various genres: platformers, puzzle games, RPGs, simulation games.


Whether players are navigating snowy landscapes, solving puzzles, embarking on epic quests, or managing bustling holiday towns, this soundtrack sets the perfect tone for festive fun and adventure. Unlock the magic of the holidays in your games today with this vibrant and evocative music pack!


You can also use this music to promote your video game on Youtube and all the other social platforms. Fill out our form to clear any Content ID claim on your promotional videos: https://www.pinegroove.net/content_id_release_form/


INCLUDED WITH THIS PACK:


  • 12 unique music themes with elaborate full-length structure;
  • 50 WAV files, including full-length versions, loops and stingers (outros);
  • 30 minutes of audio in 16 bit / 44.1 Khz format
technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  1. Â Christmas Factory (main, 2 loops, 1 stinger)
  2. Letters To Santa (main, 2 loops, 2 outros)
  3. Grand Christmas Celebration (main, 2 loops, 1 outro)
  4. Christmas Market (main, 2 loops, 2 outros)
  5. Christmas Fairy Tale (main, 2 loops, 1 outro)
  6. By The Fireplace (main, 2 loops, 1 stinger)
  7. Christmas Atmosphere (main, 2 loops, 1 outro)
  8. Christmas Village (main, 2 loops, 2 outros)
  9. Best Christmas Memories (main, 2 loops, 1 outro)
  10. Christmas Orchestra (main, 2 loops, 1 outro)
  11. Christmas Wish (main, 2 loops, 1 outro)
  12. Snow Globe Romance (main, 2 loops)


Number of Audio Wavs: 50

Number of Audio Cues: 50

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz/16 Bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of unique audio provided: 30:45

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: www.francescobiondimusic.com

Important/Additional Notes: if you want to clear a claim on your Youtube promotional video, please fill this form : https://www.pinegroove.net/content_id_release_form/
